system.description:
A cursed 50’ rope which strangles any who attempt to activate its magic.

  • Commanding: Any command issued to the rope by a character holding it activates its curse.

  • When activated: The rope springs to life and attempts to strangle the character holding it plus [[/r 1d4]] others within 10’.

  • Saving throw: Each victim may save versus spells to avoid being strangled.

  • Strangled creatures: Suffer [[/r 2d6]] damage per round, cannot cast spells, and are unable to free themselves in any way.

  • Freeing victims: @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.N1KUYlrMoNzX6QMc]{Dispel magic} causes the rope to release the victims, as does severing it.

  • Severing the rope: It has AC –2 [21] and 22 hit points. If cut through, the rope becomes non-magical.
